document_data.name: Mattrim Mereg
document_data.mainbody: '''Mattrim "Threestrings" Mereg''' ({{Pronounce|MAT|trim|_|MAIR|egg|refs=}}) was a [[bard]] and [[Harper]] spy at the [[Yawning Portal]] in [[1492 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Mattrim hid his true elevated skills as a musician to maintain a low profile. He resided in the inn and used all his afternoons and evenings to spy upon [[Zhentarim]] agents and collect information about others possible troublemakers.
document_data.History:
In [[1492 DR]], {{Waterdeep-time}} Mattrim befriended the barmaid [[Bonnie]] and, after discovering her secret, decided to help her.

Some time later, Mattrim hired adventurers to take a pouch of gold and deliver it to [[Cal'al Claddani]], a female [[half-drow]] located in [[Skullport]], in exchange for her saving a wounded Harper agent.
